item.title: Best Mexican Cuisine in South Pasadena | Tasty Delicacies
item.description: ARO Latin is the best Mexican cuisine in South Pasadena. To satisfy hungry diners we produce fresh food from the best ingredients. Visit our restaurant as soon as possible to have tasty delicacies.

item.title: Traditional Mexican Cuisine | Fresh Food in South Pasadena | ARO Latin
item.description: ARO Latin serves traditional Mexican cuisine in South Pasadena. To satisfy hungry diners we produce fresh food from the best ingredients. Head to our place as soon as possible.

item.title: Famous Mexican Offerings | Online Food Orders
item.description: Located in South Pasadena ARO Latin offers famous Latin-Mexican offerings. We are available for online orders, choose takeout, or delivery.

item.title: ARO Latin Menu | Gluten Free Mexican Dishes
item.description: ARO Latin offering classic Latin dishes and modern Mexican dishes. Our menu has Starters & Shareables, Special Entrees, and Bedidas. You can order gluten-free food from us.

item.title: ARO Latin Vegan Menu | Popular Vegan Dishes | Vegan Quesadilla
item.description: Irresistible vegan dishes are on our menu. Handpicked most popular vegan recipes are served at ARO Latin, you must try our Chaufa, Burger, Vegan Quesadilla, and House Soup.

item.title: ARO Latin Restaurant Bar Menu | White and Red Wine
item.description: ARO Latin restaurant bar menu has a special lineup of drinks. White and Red Wine, popular beers, Tequila y Mezcal, Balnco, Reposado, Anejo, Extra Anejo, and Mezcal.

item.title: ARO Latin Happy Hour Menu | Tacos | Beer and Wines
item.description: Visit us on happy hours to have delicious and special food and drinks. Empanada, Asada Fries, Quesadilla, Nachos, Tacos, Drinks like Beer, white and red wine are on our happy hours menu.

item.title: ARO Latin Events | Taco Tuesdays | Wine Wednesday
item.description: At ARO Latin we entertain our guests by organizing special events. Enjoy Latin cuisine at our Tequila Bar, our Taco Tuesdays and Wine Wednesday are famous in town.

item.title: Aro Latin in South Pasadena | Articles on ARO Latin
item.description: ARO Latin is a well-known food place in South Pasadena, CA. You can read articles about our food, please check out our website press page.

item.title: ARO Latin Gallery | Authentic Mexican Dishes
item.description: Visit our restaurant gallery, here you can find authentic Latin and Mexican dishes. ARO Latin delivers so tasty and delicious food that you can’t forget it’s taste.

item.title: Aro Latin | Order Food Online | South Pasadena
item.description: Aro Latin is a famous Dine-In place in 1019 Misson St, South Pasadena, CA, 91030. Order food online we provide fast delivery; you can also choose a takeout option. For more details contact us at (626) 799-9400.
